INSERT ALL
INTO T_ETC_ACTIVTYDATA_WECHAT( AC_BATCH_ID, AC_DISCOUNT_ID, AC_DISCOUNT_TYPE, AC_DISCOUNT_NUM, AC_ORDER_AMOUNT, AC_EXCHANGE_TYPE, AC_PAYMENT_ID, AC_PAYTIME, AC_PAYMERCHANT_ID, AC_PAYMERCHANT_NAME, AC_EQUIMENT_ID, AC_BANK_NUM, CTEATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME ) VALUES( #{item.acBatchId}, #{item.acDiscountId}, #{item.acDiscountType}, #{item.acDiscountNum}, #{item.acOrderAmount}, #{item.acExchangeType}, #{item.acPaymentId}, #{item.acPaytime}, #{item.acPaymerchantId}, #{item.acPaymerchantName}, #{item.acEquimentId}, #{item.acBankNum}, #{item.cteateTime}, #{item.modifyTime} )
SELECT 1 FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT wechat.AC_PAYMERCHANT_ID as "AC_MERCHANT_ID", wechat.AC_PAYMERCHANT_NAME as "MER_NAME", MAX(wechat.AC_DISCOUNT_NUM) as "DISCOUNT_NUM", wechat.AC_EQUIMENT_ID as "EQUIP_ID", COUNT(case when wechat.AC_EXCHANGE_TYPE='支付' then 1 else null end )-COUNT( case when wechat.AC_EXCHANGE_TYPE='退款' then 1 else null end) as "CHECK_NUM", MAX(wechat.AC_DISCOUNT_NUM)*(COUNT(case when wechat.AC_EXCHANGE_TYPE='支付' then 1 else null end )-COUNT( case when wechat.AC_EXCHANGE_TYPE='退款' then 1 else null end)) as DISCOUNT_AMOUNT FROM T_ETC_ACTIVTYDATA_WECHAT wechat WHERE wechat.AC_BATCH_ID=#{acBatchId} AND wechat.AC_PAYTIME BETWEEN #{reStartTime} and #{reEndTime} GROUP BY wechat.AC_PAYMERCHANT_ID,wechat.AC_PAYMERCHANT_NAME, wechat.AC_EQUIMENT_ID

SELECT wechat.AC_PAYMERCHANT_ID as "AC_MERCHANT_ID", mer.MER_NAME as "MER_NAME", MAX(wechat.AC_DISCOUNT_NUM) as "DISCOUNT_NUM", mer.AREA as "AREA", COUNT(case when wechat.AC_EXCHANGE_TYPE='支付' then 1 else null end )-COUNT( case when wechat.AC_EXCHANGE_TYPE='退款' then 1 else null end) as "CHECK_NUM" FROM T_ETC_ACTIVTYDATA_WECHAT wechat LEFT JOIN T_ETC_MERCHANTS mer ON wechat.AC_PAYMERCHANT_ID=mer.WXPAY_MERID WHERE wechat.AC_BATCH_ID=#{acBatchId} AND wechat.AC_PAYTIME BETWEEN #{reStartTime} and #{reEndTime} GROUP BY wechat.AC_PAYMERCHANT_ID,wechat.AC_PAYMERCHANT_NAME,mer.AREA,mer.MER_NAME

SELECT acamount.AC_PAYMERCHANT_NAME as "MER_NAME", acamount.AC_PAYMERCHANT_ID as "AC_MERCHANT_ID", SUM(case when acamount.AC_EXCHANGE_TYPE='支付' then acamount.AC_ORDER_AMOUNT else 0 end) -SUM(case when acamount.AC_EXCHANGE_TYPE='退款' then acamount.AC_ORDER_AMOUNT else 0 end) as WECHAT_AMOUNT, COUNT(1) as ACTIVE_USER_COUNT FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT AC_BANK_NUM ,AC_PAYMERCHANT_NAME,AC_PAYMERCHANT_ID,AC_ORDER_AMOUNT,AC_EXCHANGE_TYPE,AC_EQUIMENT_ID from T_ETC_ACTIVTYDATA_WECHAT WHERE AC_BATCH_ID=#{acBatchId} AND AC_PAYTIME BETWEEN #{reStartTime} and #{reEndTime} ) acamount GROUP BY acamount.AC_PAYMERCHANT_NAME,acamount.AC_PAYMERCHANT_ID
